page.title: 16ADULT LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: There are many facilities and outlets for leisure activities for adults. One of the most recent trends has been towards jogging. There are many 'fun- runs' organised that cover a distance of between five and ten miles. Many people young and old can do this activity and it does not cost them much money all they need is a pair of 'trainers'. As well as this many people play football and cricket for 'works' teams at the weekend, and make use of their company's facilities. The local sports complex is alo very popular with adults as they can play squash, swimand even do 'Pop- mobility' which is exercise in a dance style. There has been a growth in such sporting activities due to a greater interest in personal health but also because there is more 'leisure' time free.
